dispute_id.description: The unique identifier for the dispute.

create_time.description: The timestamp when the dispute was created.

update_time.description: The timestamp when the dispute was last updated.

updated_time_cut.description: The cut-off timestamp for the last update.

status.description: The current status of the dispute.

dispute_state.description: The current state of the dispute.

currency_code.description: The currency code of the disputed amount.

value.description: The value of the disputed amount.

rel.description: The relation of the link to the resource.

method.description: The HTTP method for the link.

disputed_transactions.description: Details of transactions involved in the dispute.

buyer_transaction_id.description: The transaction ID of the buyer.

seller.description: Details of the seller involved in the dispute.

merchant_id.description: The merchant ID of the seller.

outcome.description: The outcome of the dispute resolution.

dispute_life_cycle_stage.description: The stage in the life cycle of the dispute.

dispute_channel.description: The channel through which the dispute was initiated.
